Class StatBar

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      StatBar

public class StatBar
extends greenfoot.Actor

The StatBar class let's you display any stat with a little amount of code required.

Version:
January 2014
Author:
Zamoht

Constructor Detail

StatBar

public StatBar(java.awt.Color color,
               int width,
               int height,
               StatBar.Style style,
               int max,
               int current)
Creates a stat bar using the given color, width, height, style, maximum value and current value.

Parameters:
color - the color of the stat bar. Transparent colors should be avoided.
width - the width of the stat bar.
height - the height of the stat bar.
style - the style of the edges.
max - the maximum value of the shown stat.
current - the current value of the shown stat.
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Updates the stat bar every act. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

add

public void add(int change)
Adds a given amount to the value target of the stat bar.

Parameters:
change - the amount which the target should be changed. This value can be negative when subtraction is needed instead of addition.

getMax

public int getMax()
Returns the maximum value.

getValue

public int getValue()
Returns the current value.

setColor

public void setColor(java.awt.Color color)
Changes the color of the stat bar. Should not be used in the updateColor() method due to bad performance.

Parameters:
color - a new color

setColor

public void setColor(java.awt.Color color,
                     boolean update)
Changes the color of the stat bar. Use this in the updateColor() method with the update parameter set to false.

Parameters:
color - a new color.
update - a boolean which should only be true if an instant update is needed.

setMax

public void setMax(int max)
Sets the maximum value the shown stat can reach. This does not fix the font size.

Parameters:
max - the maximum value.

setMax

public void setMax(int max,
                   boolean fixFont)
Sets the maximum value the shown stat can reach.

Parameters:
max - the maximum value.
fixFont - a boolean which determines wether the font size should be adjusted. If set to true and the new maximum value is too large for the stat bar, the font size will be asjusted.

setSpeed

public void setSpeed(double speed)
Sets the update speed of the statbar. This should not be changed due to a higher maximum value since the update works with a percentage of the maximum value.

Parameters:
speed - the update speed. Setting this to 1 will change the current value with getMax()/1000 every act till the target is reached. Setting this to 2 will change the curren value with getMax()/500 and so on. Remember that the speed is a double.

setTarget

public void setTarget(int target)
Sets the target which the stat bar's current value will change to over time.

Parameters:
target - the value target

setValue

public void setValue(int value)
Instantly changes the value and updates the bar with this new value.

Parameters:
value - a new value.

updateColor

public void updateColor()
updateColor is called everytime the stat bar is updated. It should be implemented in a subclass for changing the color of the stat bar.
